metadata.notes: AppleCare+ protection plans for Apple devices

plans.name: AppleCare+

cost.note: Varies by device ($79-$269 for 2 years, or monthly options available)

purchaseRequirements: Must be purchased within 60 days of device purchase
Device must pass diagnostic test if purchased after initial sale

covered: Extends hardware coverage to 2 or 3 years from original purchase
Accidental damage protection (up to 2 incidents per year)
Battery service coverage if capacity drops below 80%
Coverage for Apple accessories (AirPods, Apple Pencil, etc.)
Same-day service at Apple Store (where available)
notCovered: Cosmetic damage (scratches, dents, broken plastic on ports)
Theft or loss (unless AppleCare+ with Theft and Loss)
Damage caused by operating outside permitted conditions
conditions: Service fees apply for accidental damage ($29-$99 depending on damage type)
Must use genuine Apple parts for repairs

plans.name: AppleCare+ with Theft and Loss
plans.fullName: AppleCare+ with Theft and Loss Protection
purchaseRequirements: Must be purchased within 60 days of device purchase
Find My must be enabled at time of loss/theft

notCovered: More than 2 theft/loss incidents per year
conditions: Deductible of $149 for theft or loss claims
Find My iPhone must be enabled
Must file police report for theft claims
